item.title: Fletching animation only on levelup?!
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

if(itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1511 || itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 946) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); setAnimation(1248); addItem(50, 1); sendMessage("You carve a shortbow out of the logs."); addSkillXP(25, 9); }

For some reason, it only does setAnimation(1248); when I level up. Why is this?
